snippet: An unauthorized drone crashed into a section of empty seats at Louis Armstrong Stadium about 8:30 p.m. Thursday causing a brief delay in a second-round match.
abstract: Second round United States Open match between Flavia Pennetta and Monica Niculescu is briefly suspended when unauthorized drone aircraft enters Louis Armstrong Stadium and crashes into unoccupied seating section.
lead_paragraph: An unauthorized drone crashed into a section of empty seats at Louis Armstrong Stadium about 8:30 p.m. Thursday causing a brief delay in a second-round match.

headline.main: Drone Crashes Into Seats at Armstrong
headline.print_headline: Drone Crashes Into Seats at Armstrong Stadium
